Items.Title:
Off-Site Hearing

Oversight – Evaluating the Latest Mitigation Plans for the 2019 L Train Tunnel Closure.

Location:	Benjamin N. Cardozo School of Law 
                      Brookdale Center
                    Jacob Burns Moot Court Room
                    55 Fifth Avenue
                    New York, NY 10003
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Off-Site Hearing: Oversight – Evaluating the Latest Mitigation Plans for the 2019 L Train Tunnel Closure.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and the Metropolitan Transportation Authority to commit to an expeditious transition to an electric bus fleet and to use electric buses as a robust part of its replacement service during the upcoming L train shutdown.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Governor & MTA to commit to an expeditious transition to an electric bus fleet and to use electric buses as a robust part of its replacement service during the upcoming L train shutdown.

Items.MatterName: Designating community information centers in the boroughs of Manhattan and Brooklyn during the course of the Canarsie Tunnel closure starting in 2019.
